text: Lev Konstantinovich Durov (, 23 December 1931 - 20 August 2015) was a Soviet- born Russian theatre and movie actor. He was born in Moscow. He began acting since 1955. He was a People's Artist of USSR. Durov died on 20 August 2015 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Moscow Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors
title: Lev Durov
